summary: Star-crossed lovers must fight on opposing sides in a battle that will determine the next Shogun.
cast: Yukie Nakama|Joe Odagiri|Tomoka Kurotani|Erika Sawajiri|Takeshi Masu|Tak Sakaguchi|Mickey Koga|Shun Itô|Hôka Kinoshita|Kenji Miyoshi|Lily|Minoru Terada|Masaki Nishina|Osami Nabe|Toshiya Nagasawa|Yutaka Matsushige|Renji Ishibashi|Kazuo Kitamura|Troy Baker|Kippei Shîna|Laura Bailey|Ed Blaylock|John Burgmeier|Colleen Clinkenbeard|Justin Cook|Greg Dulcie|R. Bruce Elliott|Juli Erickson|Grant James|Manami Kôjô|Jason Liebrecht|Mike McFarland|Takashi Miyazaki|Andy Mullins|Ui Saeki|Akari Saito|Mark Stoddard|Kent Williams|Hiroko Yashiki|Stephanie Young
title: Shinobi
